doc.field: International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records
International Federation of Professional and Technical Engineers, Local 66 Records

Williamsburg Steel Products Co. Representation fight: company holds captive meeting of employees and instigates an in-house union (Engineers Association), similar tactics of the Hollow Metal Employers Association. (Hollow Metal strike, 1957) Supreme Court rules in favor of Local 66 when company unilaterally raises wages to avoid bargaining, but compliance comes too late for the greatly reduced unit.

Series IV: Shop Files, 1937-1979 >> Williamsburg Steel Products Co. Representation fight: company holds captive meeting of employees and instigates an in-house union (Engineers Association), similar tactics of the Hollow Metal Employers Association. (Hollow Metal strike, 1957) Supreme Court rules in favor of Local 66 when company unilaterally raises wages to avoid bargaining, but compliance comes too late for the greatly reduced unit.
